steps.description: Go to Lake of Ill Omen and find the Spirit Sentinel. Say 'I will help' to receive the Test of Patience.
Go to Emerald Jungle and find the Spirit Sentinel. Say 'I will help' to receive the Test of Wisdom.
Go to Field of Bone and find the Spirit Sentinel. Say 'I will help' to receive the Test of Strength.
Complete the Test of Patience by waiting for the Spirit Sentinel to give you the next task.
Complete the Test of Wisdom by answering the Spirit Sentinel's questions correctly.
Complete the Test of Strength by defeating the enemies the Spirit Sentinel sends you.
Return to the Spirit Sentinel in Lake of Ill Omen with the completed tasks to receive the Spear of Fate.
